official.headline: Civic Assemblies Begin
official.anchor_line: City squares open for Truth and Repairs Assemblies as citizens discuss past system challenges.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd remains committed to civic dialogue and healing, maintaining stability through collective participation.

official.headline: Verified Testimony Matters
official.anchor_line: Communities work together to ensure testimony and records are genuine amid diverse perspectives.
official.contextual_reframing: The city’s adaptive governance encourages transparent review, keeping public processes fair and resilient.

official.headline: Citywide Trust Grows
official.anchor_line: New trust networks emerge, redefining citizen relationships throughout Stenograd free zones.
official.contextual_reframing: Evolving systems strengthen social bonds by supporting constructive debate and healthier civic life.

underground.headline: Truth Leaks Out
underground.anchor_line: Neighborhood leaders finally get the archives and secrets the Council tried to bury.
underground.contextual_reframing: Thanks to a handful of insiders, citizens now see the BCI for what it is: a control system scoring everyone in secret.

underground.headline: Chaos In The Squares
underground.anchor_line: Testimonies flood the new assemblies — but confusion, fake records, and planted disruptions cloud the process.
underground.contextual_reframing: Loyalists scramble to smear, but the people push back. Now trust is up for grabs and every story is questioned.

underground.headline: Don’t Trust The Feed
underground.anchor_line: Council propaganda calls this 'healing' — while technical failures and split loyalties leave the city in limbo.
underground.contextual_reframing: The system still scores you, still watches. But cracks in the machine are growing and new voices are rising.
